it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view.client.gui

Class GUILocker<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view.client.gui.GUILocker<T>

  • public class GUILocker<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Object that is used to block the client thread to wait for UI events. Type T is the type of the value the UI should deliver to the waiting thread.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GUILocker()
      Creates a new empty GUI locker

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deliver(T value)
      Delivers the given value to the locker and notifies the waiting thread.
      void interrupt()
      Interrupts the waiting thread.
      T waitForValue()
      Blocks this thread until the UI delivers data, which is then returned by this method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUILocker

        public GUILocker()
        Creates a new empty GUI locker

    • Method Detail

      • waitForValue

        public T waitForValue()
        Blocks this thread until the UI delivers data, which is then returned by this method.
        Throws:
        ClosedException - if another thread called GUILocker#interrupt().

      • deliver

        public void deliver(T value)
        Delivers the given value to the locker and notifies the waiting thread.

      • interrupt

        public void interrupt()
        Interrupts the waiting thread.
